sentences.en: a disastrous epilogue to his career
Besides epilogue, there are four chapters in this paper.
sentences.cn: 本文除了结语外, 共分四章.

sentences.en: Epilogue: Closing section at the end of a novel or play.
sentences.cn: 跋(后记): 在小说或剧本后的结束文章.

sentences.en: Fortinbras speaks the epilogue in Shakespeare's ` Hamlet '.

sentences.en: In Shakespeare's plays an actor who recites the prologue and epilogue.
sentences.cn: 莎士比亚戏剧中)朗诵序诗及收场白的演员.

sentences.en: In the epilogue, Kate talks about her grief after Anna's death.
sentences.cn: 结尾处凯特提及她对安娜的死的悲痛.

sentences.en: Mr Gorbachev narrates the introduction and the epilogue to the story.

sentences.en: The dissertation consists of three parts, which are Foreword, Text and Epilogue.
sentences.cn: 全文共分前言 、 正文和结语三部分.

sentences.en: The editor explained the morals of the news in the epilogue.
sentences.cn: 编辑在编后中阐发了这则新闻背后的道理.

sentences.en: The epilogue summarizes and generalizes the epistemic productions of this dissertation.
sentences.cn: 结语部分对本文的一些认识性成果作了总结与概括.

sentences.en: The epilogue told what eventually happened to the main characters.
sentences.cn: 结尾部分讲述了几个主要人物的最终结局.

sentences.en: The film consists of four stories plus epilogue, set in 19 th - century Sicily.
sentences.cn: 这是一部寓言式的集锦片, 讲述了西西里地区的若干民间故事.

sentences.en: The play ended with a humorous epilogue.
sentences.cn: 这出戏以幽默的收场白结束。

sentences.en: This article include the preface, the text, the epilogue and the postscript.

sentences.en: This essay consists of three parts: preface, text and epilogue.

sentences.en: When reading he attaches great importance to the epilogue of books.
sentences.cn: 他看书时很重视后面的补记.
